name: admin-dashboard.toml

description.summary: Admin dashboard with key metrics and quick actions

rawContent:
# Admin Dashboard Route
# Main admin overview screen

[route]
id = "admin-dashboard"
path = "/prototype/admin"
title = "Dashboard"

[page]
type = "authenticated"
role = "eldercare-admin"

[page.description]
summary = "Admin dashboard with key metrics and quick actions"
features = [
  "Order statistics",
  "Active specialists count",
  "Pending assignments",
  "Quick links to orders/specialists"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "admin-only"]
roles = ["eldercare-admin"]
entities = ["order", "specialist"]
platforms = ["admin-app"]

[implementation]
component = "AdminDashboard"
file = "src/prototype/pages/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx"
status = "planned"
